lead_paragraph: The International Criminal Court signaled Monday that investigations were likely in cases involving American and Afghan soldiers, as well as Taliban fighters.

byline.original: By SOMINI SENGUPTA and MARLISE SIMONS

headline.print_headline: Case Looms for Possible U.S. War Crimes in Afghanistan
headline.main: U.S. Forces May Have Committed War Crimes in Afghanistan, Prosecutor Says

snippet: The International Criminal Court signaled Monday that investigations were likely in cases involving American and Afghan soldiers, as well as Taliban fighters....
abstract: International Criminal Court prosecutor Fatou Bensouda indicates that full investigation into whether American forces committed war crimes in Afghanistan is likely.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
